original_text: Now when every maid's turn was come to go in to king Ahasuerus, after that she had been twelve months, according to the manner of the women, (for so were the days of their purifications accomplished, to wit, six months with oil of myrrh, and six months with sweet odours, and with other things for the purifying of the women;)
korean_text: 처녀마다 차례대로 아하수에로 왕에게 나아가기 전에 여자에 대하여 정한 규례대로 열두 달 동안을 행하되 여섯 달은 몰약 기름을 쓰고 여섯 달은 향품과 여자에게 쓰는 다른 물품을 써서 몸을 정결하게 하는 기한을 마치며

sentences.original_text: Now when every maid's turn was come
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 모든 처녀의 차례가 이르렀을 때

sentences.original_text: to go in to king Ahasuerus
after that she had been twelve months
according to the manner of the women
for so were the days of their purifications accomplished
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 그들의 정결의 날들이 마쳐졌으니

sentences.original_text: to wit, six months with oil of myrrh
and six months with sweet odours
and with other things for the purifying of the women
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여성들의 정결을 위한 다른 것들로
